Token.Abstract: An NSManagedObjectContext category that encapsulates some common fetch requests.
Returns all objects from the entity, sorted using the specified sort descriptors.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity to fetch.

Parameter.Name: sortDescriptors
Parameter.Abstract: The sort descriptors to apply to this fetch request.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of NSManagedObject instances, nil if the results are empty.

Token.Abstract: Returns all objects from the entity, filtered by the specified predicate.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity to fetch.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: The predicate to apply to this fetch request.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of NSManagedObject instances, nil if the results are empty.

Token.Abstract: Returns all objects from the entity, sorted using the specified sort descriptors and filtered by the given predicate.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity to fetch.

Parameter.Name: sortDescriptors
Parameter.Abstract: The sort descriptors to apply to this fetch request.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: The predicate to apply to this fetch request.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of NSManagedObject instances, nil if the results are empty.

Token.Abstract: Returns an NSManagedObject instance from the specified entity with the given identifier.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity to fetch.

Parameter.Name: autoCreate
Parameter.Abstract: If yes, when the object is not found, it is automatically created.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSManagedObject instance if found, nil otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Returns an NSManagedObject instance from the specified entity with the given identifier, filtered by predicate.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: The predicate to apply to this fetch request.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity to fetch.

Parameter.Name: autoCreate
Parameter.Abstract: If yes, when the object is not found, it is automatically created.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSManagedObject instance if found, nil otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Returns an NSManagedObject instance from the specified entity with the given identifier, sorted by sortDescriptors and filtered by predicate.

Parameter.Name: sortDescriptors
Parameter.Abstract: The sort descriptors to apply to this fetch request.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: The predicate to apply to this fetch request.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity to fetch.

Parameter.Name: autoCreate
Parameter.Abstract: If yes, when the object is not found, it is automatically created.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSManagedObject instance if found, nil otherwise.
